explanation: [0-0] The video has four split screens, featuring a blonde cartoon girl standing at a doorway facing a hallway with white walls around her.

[0-2] The girl then approaches the camera, smiling and looking ahead. She wears a yellow short-sleeved shirt and a red skirt with a red bow hair accessory. The scene transitions to a close-up of the girl's face, with the four split screens displaying the green caption "STUDY?", yellow caption "EAT?", pink caption "CLEAN UP?", and blue caption "SLEEP?".
